code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import{Fonts}from"../../../../assets";import{Colors,horizontalScale,moderateScale,verticalScale}from"../../../../theme";var styling=function styling(theme){return StyleSheet.create({card:{flex:1,flexDirection:'row',alignItems:'center'},circleView:{height:Platform.OS==="web"?50:moderateScale(50),width:Platform.OS==="web"?50:moderateScale(50),borderRadius:moderateScale(60),backgroundColor:Colors[theme].blue10,justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'},headerText:{fontFamily:Fonts.medium,fontSize:Platform.OS==="web"?14:18,marginLeft:horizontalScale(10),color:Colors[theme].black},helloStyle:{fontFamily:Fonts.regular,fontSize:14,marginLeft:horizontalScale(10),color:Colors[theme].black},detailText:{color:Colors[theme].white,fontSize:Platform.OS==="web"?14:moderateScale(18),fontFamily:Fonts.medium}});};export default styling;
